text: Alexander Nadson (; 8 August 1926 - 15 April 2015) was a Belarusian émigré social and religious leader. He was the Apostolic Visitor for Belarusian Greek Catholic faithfuls abroad from 1986 until his death. He became a priest in 1958 and worked in the United Kingdom for most of his life. Nadson was born in the town of Haradzeya, Nesvizh Raion of the Minsk Oblast. Nadson died on 15 April 2015 in London, aged 88. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Belarusian people Category:British historians Category:British priests Category:Christian ministers Category:Eastern Catholics Category:Military personnel of World War II Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Polish military people
